DOC.brief_summary: To assess long-term safety efficacy AMG 334 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Long-term Safety Efficacy AMG 334 Chronic Migraine Prevention .
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , open-label study ass long-term safety efficacy AMG 334 . All subject receive open-label AMG 334 subcutaneous ( SC ) dose periodically 13 month follow safety follow- visit .
